about_the_game:
In 1989 the original adventure of Last Half of Darkness was released to the PC. Now on it's 35th anniversary the story continues with updated spine-chilling graphics and a haunting soundtrack.

Your aunt sure was a strange one. She was some sort of witch or something. A good witch though, practicing only good spells and magic. In fact, she was working on a potion just before she was killed. Now the secret will go to the grave with her... unless you can find the missing ingredients.

FEATURES

  • Fluid and Smooth First Person Movement

  • Realistic Creepy Environments

  • Haunting Soundtrack

  • Story-Based Exploration

  • Spine-Tingling Puzzles

  • Adjustable DIFFICULTY Settings To Allow For An Easier Or More Challenging Experience

Explore deep behind the gates of "Paraíso Del Norte" (a disturbingly dark estate left behind by your late aunt) to uncover the darkest of secrets and terror in this psychological horror experience.

"As dawn approaches and night disappears

Unlocking terror and ghostly fears

A dark spirit exists beyond heartless

Unleashed during the Last Half of Darkness"


Here's what a few Twitch streamers, who played an early version of Last Half of Darkness, are saying about the game...

"I had such a blast playing this game! The atmosphere was eerie and I felt cautious walking through the halls. The storytelling was done well too! I look forward to seeing is there is sequel to come! Def would recommend to anyone who loves adventure horrors!" - Michelleeeyx

"It's awesome! It has been so much fun... the story is very interesting... I love this game. The puzzles are great... the esthetic is great!" - Giaispeachy

"Had a lot of fun playing...The story is incredible." - Thecouchpawtatoes

"I really enjoyed the gameplay... The puzzles are just challenging enough to where you have to think, but they’re not frustratingly difficult for someone like me who isn’t very good at logical thinking." - Prawn Star Itsi


"I enjoyed it!" - Gozen


"I am transported back to 1989... I love it I actually love it! A lot of detail." - Raimyah

"I enjoyed this... I had a fun time." - A_Cute_Kuma

"This is the most esthetically pleasing horror game I've ever seen... It's gorgeous!" - TiredPamster


"I really, really enjoyed the game." - Thalisha87


"Having fun... It's got a really good combination of things..." - Nor_Skor


"This game is really cool! The visuals are incredible, the puzzles weren't too hard... this was a good one!" - BirdFurgeson


"...I am loving this game so much! Can't wait for the full release! This has been great!" - AmberWixx

"It's been super fun! I had a good time. Yeah, I liked it." - KamiiMaou

"Very, very engaging gameplay. Lots of great jumpscares! It is a massive puzzle... all of it." - Teanyheals

"I enjoyed it. I thought it was great!" - TipsyTriggers

"Really enjoying the game!" - MissMillz

"Very fun game" - Red Panda Void

"This one has to be my favorite of yours so far. I want to play it again start to finish" - Reverend_Pickle

"I love the game. Great game. I like it. Very, very spoopy." - WallaKoalas

"I definitely have enjoyed playing... I absolutely recommend when it comes out everybody have a look" - HorrorQueenHarley

"The ambience is really good." - CptnSumi


"Awesome game - what an absolute fright of a time!" - Kattatonia

"It was good. I really enjoyed it! Very good. Very well done. Was not expecting that ending!" - Burtro

"I'm impressed! This game is very interesting. It's really, really good. It's very well put together. The puzzles are definitely a good challenge." - Sonik0731

"I think it's pretty cool!" - SerAvium

"Incredible... entertained... unbelievable!" - Pooch

"I had a lot of fun... I enjoyed it" - Dynodare

"Loving the puzzles in this game, very unique!" - Doubleedger


"That was beautiful... the soundtrack was really good... very good ending!" - Yungsavarooni

  • Storage: 16 GB available space
